item.description:
Sorry for the short notice, but tonight, Thursday, October 25, from 7-8 (8:30) PM ET Berny Dohrmann, Chairman and Founder of CEO Space International will be hosting a live Virtual Preview.

CEO Space is a new kind of trade show that uses meals in place of traditional booths. Learn more about this exciting Forum and how it can help take your business to the next level.

-----------------------------------------

Optional video - on your computer open a browser to:

https://ceospace.megameeting.com/ (for best audio use call-in number)

Select Guest and Meeting room is: Chairman
Please enter your first and last name.


Call-in info:  504-353-1003
Code: 8865583#

Please be sure to mute background noise by pressing *6, or use the mute button on your phone.

------------------------------------------

If you are selected for coaching and are asked for your Club President's name, tell them Linda Kaye.

Feel free to direct any questions to me via email lindakaye@ceospacenewengland.com or call 603-296-6215.

Linda
item.name: Virtual Preview - learn about CEO Space from the Founder
